Game2

Class JumpingBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game2.JumpingBar

  • public class JumpingBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    2015-11-02 Jumping Bar in the game for player to click and to make the crab move.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Brendan, Danielle, David, Huayu and Zhanglong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JumpingBar(int stop1, int stop2)
      Constructor for jumpingBar if value increases above stop2 but not yet stop1, crab climb over obstacle if over stop1, fail to climb over obstacle

    • Constructor Detail

      • JumpingBar

        public JumpingBar(int stop1,
          int stop2)
        Constructor for jumpingBar if value increases above stop2 but not yet stop1, crab climb over obstacle if over stop1, fail to climb over obstacle
        Parameters:
        stop1 - value between first part of bar and second part
        stop2 - value between second part and third part
